name: Chloe's Dream Resort
description:
Help weary workers relax and unwind after a hard day's work in Chloe's Dream Resort, an enterprising time-management adventure through dreamtime!

The Dream Land resorts were once the perfect place to relax and unwind after a hard day's work. But monsters scared away all the customers and employees! Help Chloe realize her dream of fixing up all 5 resorts, including a ski lodge, beach hotel, and a grand casino! Use Chloe's fast feet to serve customers quickly and help them ski, surf, dance, and even learn magic tricks to make handsome tips. Use the money to update each resort!

Full Version Features:

* 60 progressive levels
* 5 unique resorts
* 3 fun mini-games

Download and play today!
